title: Control D blocks online threats, ads, and more for less than $35
content:
Macworld

When it comes to web security, we’re really all looking for the same thing: a one-stop solution that keeps all of your internet access secure and protected across all of your household-connected devices. And if these tools helped your digital workspace run smoother and more efficiently, that certainly wouldn’t hurt either.

With Control D, you can enjoy a more secure and ad-free browsing experience. A Some Control 5-year plan is now only $34.97 (reg. $120) and protects up to 10 devices in your household.

Control D starts by blocking annoying ads for a smoother digital experience. You can set up different profiles with Control D and customize each profile’s rules. Those with children can also utilize its parental controls to block inappropriate or restricted content from their kids.

You can even improve your productivity with Control D, as it allows users to enact a productivity schedule that blocks distracting content as they work or study. By adding this tool, you’ll additionally gain speedier and more secure device performance.

Block ads and enjoy a more protected digital experience with a Control D Some Control 5-year subscription, now just $34.97, the best price online. Offer ends April 21 at 11:59 PM Pacific!
